verses.verse: Moreover the Spirit <WH7307> lifted me up, <WH5375> and brought <WH935> me to the east <WH6931> gate <WH8179> of Yahweh <WH3068>'s house, <WH1004> which looks <WH6437> eastward: <WH6921> and see, <WH6607> at the door of the gate <WH8179> twenty <WH6242> - five <WH2568> men; <WH376> and I saw <WH7200> in their midst <WH8432> Jaazaniah <WH2970> the son <WH1121> of Azzur, <WH5809> and Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah, <WH1141> princes <WH8269> of the people. <WH5971>
He said <WH559> to me, <WH1121> Son of man, <WH120> these are the men <WH582> who devise <WH2803> iniquity, <WH205> and who give <WH3289> wicked <WH7451> counsel <WH6098> in this city; <WH5892>
who say, <WH559> The time is not near <WH7138> to build <WH1129> houses: <WH1004> this is the caldron, <WH5518> and we are the meat. <WH1320>
Therefore prophesy <WH5012> against them, <WH5012> prophesy, son <WH1121> of man. <WH120>

The Spirit <WH7307> of Yahweh <WH3068> fell <WH5307> on me, <WH559> and he said to me, <WH559> Speak, Thus says <WH559> Yahweh: <WH3068> Thus you have said, <WH559> house <WH1004> of Israel; <WH3478> for I know <WH3045> the things that come <WH4609> into your mind. <WH7307>
You have multiplied <WH7235> your slain <WH2491> in this city, <WH5892> and you have filled <WH4390> its streets <WH2351> with the slain. <WH2491>

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH3069> Your slain <WH2491> whom you have laid <WH7760> in its midst, <WH8432> they are the meat, <WH1320> and this is the caldron; <WH5518> but you shall be brought out <WH3318> of its midst. <WH8432>
You have feared <WH3372> the sword; <WH2719> and I will bring <WH935> the sword <WH2719> on you, <WH5002> says the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>
I will bring you forth out <WH3318> of its midst, <WH8432> and deliver <WH5414> you into the hands <WH3027> of strangers, <WH2114> and will execute <WH6213> judgments among you. <WH8201>
You shall fall <WH5307> by the sword; <WH2719> I will judge <WH8199> you in the border <WH1366> of Israel; <WH3478> and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh. <WH3068>
This shall not be your caldron, <WH5518> neither shall you be the meat <WH1320> in its midst; <WH8432> I will judge <WH8199> you in the border <WH1366> of Israel; <WH3478>

and you shall know <WH3045> that I am Yahweh: <WH3068> for you have not walked <WH1980> in my statutes, <WH2706> neither have you executed <WH6213> my ordinances, <WH4941> but have done <WH6213> after the ordinances <WH4941> of the nations <WH1471> that are around you. <WH5439>

It happened, <WH5012> when I prophesied, that Pelatiah <WH6410> the son <WH1121> of Benaiah <WH1141> died. <WH4191> Then fell I down <WH5307> on my face, <WH6440> and cried <WH2199> with a loud <WH1419> voice, <WH6963> and said, <WH559> Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> Yahweh! <WH136> will you make <WH6213> a full end <WH3617> of the remnant <WH7611> of Israel? <WH3478>
The word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> came to me, <WH559> saying,

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> your brothers, <WH251> even your brothers, <WH251> the men <WH582> of your relatives, <WH1353> and all the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> all of them, <WH3427> to whom the inhabitants of Jerusalem <WH3389> have said, <WH559> Go far <WH7368> away from Yahweh. <WH3068> This land <WH776> has been given <WH5414> to us for a possession. <WH4181>

Therefore say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> Whereas I have removed them far off <WH7368> among the nations, <WH1471> and whereas I have scattered <WH6327> them among the countries, <WH776> yet will I be to them a sanctuary <WH4720> for a little <WH4592> while in the countries <WH776> where they have come. <WH935>

Therefore say, <WH559> Thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh: <WH136> I will gather <WH6908> you from the peoples, <WH5971> and assemble <WH622> you out of the countries <WH776> where you have been scattered, <WH6327> and I will give <WH5414> you the land <WH127> of Israel. <WH3478>
They shall come <WH935> there, <WH5493> and they shall take away all the detestable things <WH8251> of it and all its abominations from there. <WH8441>

I will give <WH5414> them one <WH259> heart, <WH3820> and I will put <WH5414> a new <WH2319> spirit <WH7307> within <WH7130> you; <WH5493> and I will take the stony <WH68> heart <WH3820> out of their flesh, <WH1320> and will give <WH5414> them a heart <WH3820> of flesh; <WH1320>
that they may walk <WH3212> in my statutes, <WH2708> and keep <WH8104> my ordinances, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them: <WH5971> and they shall be my people, and I will be their God. <WH430>

But as for them whose heart <WH3820> walks <WH1980> after the heart <WH3820> of their detestable things <WH8251> and their abominations, <WH8441> I will bring <WH5414> their way <WH1870> on their own heads, <WH7218> says <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Yahweh. <WH3069>

Then the cherubim <WH3742> lifted up <WH5375> their wings, <WH3671> and the wheels <WH212> were beside <WH5980> them; <WH3519> and the glory of the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> was over them above. <WH4605>

The glory <WH3519> of Yahweh <WH3068> went up <WH5927> from the midst <WH8432> of the city, <WH5892> and stood <WH5975> on the mountain <WH2022> which is on the east side <WH6924> of the city. <WH5892>

The Spirit <WH7307> lifted me up, <WH5375> and brought <WH935> me in the vision <WH4758> by the Spirit <WH7307> of God <WH430> into Chaldea, <WH3778> to them of the captivity. <WH1473> So the vision <WH4758> that I had seen <WH7200> went up from me. <WH5927>
Then I spoke <WH1696> to them of the captivity <WH1473> all the things <WH1697> that Yahweh <WH3068> had shown me. <WH7200>
